name: DARE DEVIL (v1.0.1) (ThatHammerkind)
description: (not finished) Legend tells of a mysterious, haunted tower in the woods. Not going inside there... unless your friends dare you to. (read all the way down, theres more past the credits) beat each floor by blasting all enemies (skull icon shows your progress). use WASD to move, CLICK to shoot, E to reload (bullet icon shows how many shots you have). win quickly to gain xp (number at the bottom). at 100 xp, you level up and chose a powerup: +1 LIFE if you have less than your max lives, +1 SHOT per reload, +1 MAX LIFE. ART: all drawn/animated by me (@ThatHammerKind) MUSIC: all composed by @squirrelsRcool CODING: all by me (@ThatHammerKind) except... -- heapsort: @mookie -- rectangle filler: @-Rex- SOUNDS: https://www.zapsplat.com LAST NOTES: -- The rooms are procedurally generated, so you will never have the same layout of walls twice!! -- Unlock mummies on floor 3 and pumpkins on floor 8. -- Slimes move directly towards you -- Mummies move towards you and shoot lasers -- Pumpkins explode and deal 3 damage -- Space to pause the game (only in battle) -- If you liked it, maybe heart and star the game
